page.title: 14Employment around Brinklow
page.content: {Brinklow}was once a self-contained, self supporting community with many craftsmen and tradesmen. Farmers employed many people as did the local big houses. The village dockyard no longer exists but a boat hire business operates at{Stretton under Fosse. Today Brinklow offers employment through its school,shops,cafes,pubs, clubs,restaurants and garages and gives work to doctors,vets,postmen, policeman and religious ministers. {Coombe Abbey}employs people for the country park,cafeteria and the house itself for Mediaeval Banquets. The main centre of employment is the large industrial site of{Rolls Royce.}People travel from many areas to work there. Most work is now outside the area in Coventry or Rugby. It is sad there is now a fairly high rate of unemployment.
